definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

sentences.english: Causes of central segregation and protective measures are described.
sentences.chinese: 論述了中心偏析產生的原因及防止措施。

sentences.english: The microsegregation of each element decreased with increasing cooling rate.
sentences.chinese: 各元素顯微偏析程度隨冷卻速率增大而減小。

sentences.english: The grave situation even paralizes the whole project of heap leaching operation.
sentences.chinese: 嚴重的礦堆偏析甚至會導致整個堆浸提金工程的失敗。

sentences.english: All alloy elements and process factors can influence the micro-segregation.
sentences.chinese: 合金元素和工藝因素都會影響微觀偏析。

sentences.english: In the water-cooled copper mold, the organizations and the grains were distributed unevenly and regional segregation was existed.
sentences.chinese: 銅模獲得的合金組織大小分佈不均且存在區域偏析。

sentences.english: When alloys such as Sn-Pb solidify from bottom, channel segregation can also form.
sentences.chinese: 的合金，垂直定向凝固時也可形成通道偏析。

sentences.english: Impurities tend to segregate at grain boundaries .
sentences.chinese: 雜質常常在晶粒間界偏析。

sentences.english: Simple Model of Microsegregat on during Solidification of Steels. pdf. pdf.
sentences.chinese: 講述了鋼固化過程中的，顯微偏析現象模型。

sentences.english: We can forecast the segregation of binary alloy by the change of surface energy.
sentences.chinese: 通過表面能的變化可以預測二元合金的表面偏析行爲。

sentences.english: The serious positive segregation centralizes around the centreline of the billet.
sentences.chinese: 嚴重的正偏析集中在中心線周圍。

sentences.english: After changing from mould casting into continuous casting, the composition segregation decreases and the toughness steel increases.
sentences.chinese: 模鑄轉連鑄後，減輕了成分偏析，提高了鋼的韌性。
